children.name: test_api_requests[case0]
parameters: {'name': '药品搜索-正常流测试', 'request': {'url': 'https://171.cdfortis.com/drugService/pharm/searchDrug', 'method': 'POST', 'body': {'cateGoryId': 0, 'chainId': 26138, 'click': 0, 'groupByNameAndSpec': False, 'page': 1, 'rows': 10, 'spec': None, 'storeId': 0, 'text': '特非那定片', 'type': 0}, 'headers': None, 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8'}, 'expect': {'status_code': 200, 'schema': ['code', 'data', 'message'], 'field_assertions': {'code': 200, 'data.total': 15}}}

children.name: test_api_requests[case1]
parameters: {'name': '药品搜索-空关键词测试', 'request': {'url': 'https://171.cdfortis.com/drugService/pharm/searchDrug', 'body': {'cateGoryId': 0, 'chainId': 26138, 'click': 0, 'groupByNameAndSpec': False, 'page': 1, 'rows': 10, 'spec': None, 'storeId': 0, 'text': ' ', 'type': 0}, 'headers': None, 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8'}, 'expect': {'status_code': 200, 'msg': '缺少参数'}}

children.name: test_api_requests[case2]
parameters: {'name': '特非那定片精确搜索', 'request': {'url': 'https://171.cdfortis.com/drugService/pharm/searchDrug', 'method': 'POST', 'headers': None, 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8', 'body': {'text': '特非那定片', 'page': 1, 'size': 10}}, 'response': {'schema': {'resultCode': 0, 'result': [{'commonName': {'type': 'string', 'pattern': '^[一-龥]+$'}, 'spec': {'type': 'string', 'minLength': 1}, 'price': {'type': 'number', 'minimum': 0}}]}, 'examples': [{'resultCode': 0, 'result': [{'commonName': '特非那定片', 'spec': '60毫克*12片', 'price': 4.6, 'companyName': '江苏联环药业股份有限公司'}], 'msg': 'success'}]}}

children.name: test_api_requests[case3]
parameters: {'name': '空关键词搜索', 'request': {'url': 'https://171.cdfortis.com/drugService/pharm/searchDrug', 'method': 'POST', 'body': {}, 'headers': None, 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8'}, 'expect': {'resultCode': 200, 'msg': '搜索关键词不能为空'}}

children.name: test_api_requests[case4]
parameters: {'name': '分页边界测试', 'request': {'url': 'https://171.cdfortis.com/drugService/pharm/searchDrug', 'method': 'POST', 'body': {'text': '感冒灵', 'page': 0, 'size': 101}, 'headers': None, 'Content-Type': 'application/json; charset=utf-8'}, 'expect': {'resultCode': 200, 'msg': '分页参数超出范围'}}
